title: Crime in England and Wales: Police Force Area Data Tables
summary: Data from Home Office police recorded crime. Shows the number of police recorded crimes, percentage change from previous year and rate per 1,000 population by offence group and police force area.
metaDescription: Data from Crime Survey for England and Wales (CSEW) and Home Office police recorded crime. Shows the number of police recorded crimes, including percentage change from the previous year and rate per 1,000 population by offence group and police force area.
